issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h2. Problem

Red AppC logo screen is present on non-retina devices when the project has been generated for AD HOC distribution.

h2. Test Case

Generate an AD HOC distribution IPA of project and install it on the device. Xcode project generated also has the red AppC logo splash.

h2. Notes

Seems to be fixed in master 3.1.0.v20130114171802
fields.summary: iOS - Generate build for AD HOC distribution has the red AppC splash screen on non-retina devices
fields.environment:
Application type: mobile
Titanium SDK: 3.0.0.GA
Alloy Version: 0.3.5
Platform & version: iOS 6.0
Device: iPhone 3GS (Non-retina display)
Host Operating System: OSX 10.8.2
Titanium Studio: 3.0.1.201212181159

comments.body: Resolving as fixed. Needs confirmation by QE before closing.

Closing per comments and conversation with [~rtlechuga]
Tested an application with custom icons and splash screens, works as expected.
